name: Phantom Passage (rhyslove)
description:
This is a game created for the Extra Credits #5 Game Jam.

A phantom trying to find the missing passages of her journey by creating new passages to pass through in order to find the passage to afterlife.

Created By:

-HyenaLobster (Artist, Designer, Sound FX)
